title: Commuters: Large, Cat friendly, Forrest Hills/JP-Arboretum
posting_body: Great condition, sunny, easy walk to Forest Hills, close to JP, birds and flowering trees of Arnold Arboretum, Rozzie sq and transportation.
BEAT THE HIGH PRICES OF JAMAICA PLAIN
1 master bedroom, 1 smaller bedroom/office and 1 bath
Perfect for a S OR C / Non Smoking
Hardwood floors and tiles, no w/w carpet
Responsible landlord, neighborhood is very friendly.
Low utility costs due to energy efficient gas heating system and new windows.
Street parking/ no permit required/ plenty of spaces.
Rent is calculated for 1 person, extra $200 for each additional.
10 minutes to the Jamaica Pond, minutes to Arnolds, Near Jamaica Plain , Brookline , Boston, Needham, Dedham
Convenient to Boston Longwood Medical, Hospitals, VA
Please email your specific circumstance: (why are you moving, how many people would be living in the apartment, budget, etc) AND times that you are available to see the apartment.
